attributes.action: Make the licensee of a Licensed Public House / Bar directly responsible for the legality of the media from which music is played on at their premises.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently the entertainer is responsible, and playing of illegal counterfeit Compact Discs is widespread. This is killing the industry especially in the Karaoke sector, where the use of copied media gives criminals a several thousand popund advantage over law abiding DJs. We propose to make the Licensee responsible, as well as the entertainer, therefore putting their license at risk.
